us.ba3.me.markers

Class MarkerMapInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.ba3.me.MapInfo
      • us.ba3.me.markers.MarkerMapInfo

  • public final class MarkerMapInfo
extends MapInfo
    Describes a disk-based clustered marker map. May also be used to generate a clustered marker map on-device.

    Example usage: 

            //Add marker map
        MarkerMapInfo mapInfo = new MarkerMapInfo();
        mapInfo.name = this.name;
        mapInfo.zOrder = 100;
        mapInfo.mapType = MapType.kMapTypeFileMarker;
        mapInfo.sqliteFileName = _sqliteFile.getAbsolutePath();
        mapInfo.markerMapDelegate = this;
        mapInfo.hitTestingEnabled = true;
        mapInfo.markerImageLoadingStrategy = MarkerImageLoadingStrategy.kMarkerImageLoadingAsynchronous;
        mapView.addMapUsingMapInfo(mapInfo);

    • Field Detail

      • markerMapDelegate

        public MarkerMapDelegate markerMapDelegate
        For marker maps, the marker map delegate that will provide marker images.

      • markers

        public MarkerInfo[] markers
        For marker maps, the array of markers to add.

      • clusterDistance

        public float clusterDistance
        Cluster distance to use for markers.

      • markerImageLoadingStrategy

        public MarkerImageLoadingStrategy markerImageLoadingStrategy
        Controls how the engine requests marker images. Defaults to kAsynchronousMarkerImageLoading. Note: frame hitching can occur if you use kMarkerImageLoadingAsynchronous for a large set of markers. Use asynchronous loading when possible.

      • hitTestingEnabled

        public boolean hitTestingEnabled
        Controls whether the engine performs touch-point hit testing against the markers. Defaults to YES.

      • fadeEnabled

        public boolean fadeEnabled
        Specifies whether markers fade in.

      • fadeInTime

        public double fadeInTime
        Amount of time in seconds that markers fade in.

      • fadeOutTime

        public double fadeOutTime
        Amount of time in seconds that markers fade out.
